targets.query: SELECT COUNT(response_time) FROM  "$test"  WHERE  "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter
SELECT COUNT(response_time) FROM  "$test"  WHERE  "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND "status" = 'KO'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY count

SELECT MEAN("throughput") FROM  (SELECT count("response_time") AS "throughput"  from "$test"  WHERE "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s))
SELECT min("response_time") FROM  "$test"  WHERE  "simulation"= '$test' AND "status" = 'OK'  AND  "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("response_time") FROM  "$test"  WHERE  "simulation"= '$test' AND "status" = 'OK'  AND  "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter
SELECT percentile("response_time", $percentile) FROM  "$test"  WHERE  "simulation"= '$test' AND "status" = 'OK'  AND  "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter

SELECT percentile("response_time", $percentile) FROM "$test" WHERE "simulation"='$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' and "status"='OK' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping), request_name fill(null)

SELECT percentile("response_time", $percentile) FROM "$test" WHERE "simulation"='$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' and "status"='KO' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping), request_name fill(null)
select sum("max") from (select max("active") from "users" where "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' group by lg_id) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(0)
select sum("max") from (select max("active") from "users" group by lg_id) WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(0)

SELECT max("throughputt") FROM (SELECT count("response_time") AS "throughputt"  from "$test"  WHERE "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND "status" = 'OK'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)) GROUP BY time($grouping)

SELECT mean("throughput") FROM (SELECT count("response_time") AS "throughput"  from "$test"  WHERE "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND "status" = 'OK'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)) GROUP BY time($grouping)

SELECT max("throughputt") FROM (SELECT count("response_time") AS "throughputt"  from "$test"  WHERE "simulation"= '$test' AND "test_type"='$test_type' AND  "env"='$env' AND "status" = 'KO' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)) GROUP BY time($grouping)
SELECT COUNT("response_time") FROM "$test" WHERE simulation='$test' AND status='OK' AND "response_time"<=$low_limit AND env ='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(null)

SELECT COUNT("response_time") FROM "$test" WHERE simulation='$test' AND status='OK' AND "response_time">$low_limit AND "response_time"<$high_limit  AND env ='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(null)
SELECT COUNT("response_time")  FROM "$test" WHERE simulation='$test' AND status='OK' AND "response_time">=$high_limit  AND env ='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(null)
SELECT COUNT("response_time") FROM "$test" WHERE simulation='$test' AND status='KO' AND env ='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($grouping) fill(null)
SELECT count("response_time") FROM  "$test"  WHERE "simulation"= '$test' AND "status" = 'OK' AND "env"='$env' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY request_name
